public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> create​(@RequestBody
                                                            User user)
        POST Method for create a new User.
        Parameters:
        user - User to will be persist.
        Returns:
        User created, 201 code.

      • update

        @PutMapping("/{identification}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> update​(@PathVariable("identification")
                                                            java.lang.String identification,
                                                            @RequestBody
                                                            User user)
        PUT Method that update an User.
        Parameters:
        identification - number of the document that identified the user.
        user - User to will be updated.
        Returns:
        User updated, 200 code.

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> findByIdentification​(@PathVariable("identification")
                                                                          java.lang.String identification)
        GET Method for find an User by identification card number.
        Parameters:
        identification - number of the document that identified the user.
        Returns:
        User identified by param.

      • findByName

        @GetMapping("/name/{name}/{page}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<User>> findByName​(@PathVariable("page")
                                                                                int page,
                                                                                @PathVariable("name")
                                                                                java.lang.String name)
        GET Method for find Users by name.
        Parameters:
        page - number of page to list.
        name - name of User to find.
        Returns:
        List of 20 Users or less named like param.

      • changePassword

        @PostMapping("/{identification}/change-password")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity changePassword​(@PathVariable("identification")
                                                              java.lang.String identification,
                                                              java.lang.String oldPass,
                                                              java.lang.String newPass)
        PUT Method for update the password of an User.
        Parameters:
        identification - number of the document that identified the user.
        oldPass - String that represents the actual password of the User.
        newPass - String that represents the new password of the User.
        Returns:
        200 code.
